Breadth-First.Explanation: Collecting broad visual clues (mural, hotel sign, bridge) and forming a general hypothesis (Cannes) before searching for confirmation

Depth-First.Explanation: Derived and selected a specific neighborhood hypothesis based on found mural location
Verifying the hypothesis by examining multiple specific clues and sources
Depth-First.KeyElement: Marilyn Monroe mural, Cannes Riviera Hotel sign, travel site and municipal map confirmation

Depth-First.Explanation: Converging on the final precise address as the confirmed location
Depth-First.KeyElement: 16 Boulevard d’Alsace, Prado – République, Cannes, France, Europe

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After gathering broad clues, a specific neighborhood hypothesis was proposed, shifting to convergent verification
